Comment.value:
How to Use: 
During race selection select your base race, then click the subrace box and type in EXACTLY the name as it is in the syntax prompt below.

Subraces - Dwarf


Arctic Dwarf

Syntax: Dwarf-arctic
Stats: 
+4 Constitution

Feats: 
Epic Energy Resistance Cold I

Special ability: 
Cold Shield (Elemental Shield): Once per day for 1 round per character level: 10% vulnerable to fire, 10% immunity to cold. Damage Shield Level 1: 2d4, Level 18: 2d6, Level 28: 2d8 and at Level 38: 2d10 + 1 per 2 character levels of cold damage. This does not stack with any other damage shield!



Duergar Dwarf

Syntax: Dwarf-duergar

Stats: 
+2 Dexterity, +4 Wisdom, -2 Charisma

Immunities: 
10% Magical

Vulnerabilities: 
5% Positive

Feats: 
Weapon Focus: Sickle, Improved Critical: Sickle

Light Sensitive: 
-2 ab/-4 ac in outdoor areas during daylight hours.

Special Ability: 
Stone Hold (chaos shield type effect): ability to call upon the aid of the stones to hold their opponents in place - once a day/5 min duration, 2% chance on hit, hold lasts for 1d3 rounds and can stack. Penalty: while using stone hold, duergar loses his dexterity bonus (-2 dex).

Note: 
Remember Sickle feats are usable for Sickles, Heavy Picks, and Light Picks.



Mountain Dwarf

Syntax: Dwarf-mountain

Stats: 
+2 Strength, +4 Constitution, -2 Charisma

Feats: 
Exotic Weapon Proficiency, Weapon Specialization: Dwarven Waraxe

Special Ability: 
Avalanche (Earthquake): 3 times a day the mountain dwarf can cast a special Earthquake at their character level. I.e. a 60th level Mountain Dwarf will cast a 60th level Earthquake.

value.0:
How to Use: 
During race selection select your base race, then click the subrace box and type in EXACTLY the name as it is in the syntaxprompt below.

Subraces - Dwarf


Arctic Dwarf

Syntax: Dwarf-arctic
Stats: 
+4 Constitution

Feats: 
Epic Energy Resistance Cold I

Special ability: 
Cold Shield (Elemental Shield): Once per day for 1 round per character level: 10% vulnerable to fire, 10% immunity to cold. Damage Shield Level 1: 2d4, Level 18: 2d6, Level 28: 2d8 and at Level 38: 2d10 + 1 per 2 character levels of cold damage. This does not stack with any other damage shield!



Duergar Dwarf

Syntax: Dwarf-duergar

Stats: 
+2 Dexterity, +4 Wisdom, -2 Charisma

Immunities: 
10% Magical

Vulnerabilities: 
5% Positive

Feats: 
Weapon Focus: Sickle, Improved Critical: Sickle

Light Sensitive: 
-2 ab/-4 ac in outdoor areas during daylight hours.

Special Ability: 
Stone Hold (chaos shield type effect): ability to call upon the aid of the stones to hold their opponents in place - once a day/5 min duration, 2% chance on hit, hold lasts for 1d3 rounds and can stack. Penalty: while using stone hold, duergar loses his dexterity bonus (-2 dex).

Note: 
Remember Sickle feats are usable for Sickles, Heavy Picks, and Light Picks.



Mountain Dwarf

Syntax: Dwarf-mountain

Stats: 
+2 Strength, +4 Constitution, -2 Charisma

Feats: 
Exotic Weapon Proficiency, Weapon Specialization: Dwarven Waraxe

Special Ability: 
Avalanche (Earthquake): 3 times a day the mountain dwarf can cast a special Earthquake at their character level. I.e. a 60th level Mountain Dwarf will cast a 60th level Earthquake.

How to Use: 
During race selection select your base race, then click the subrace box and type in EXACTLY the name as it is in the syntaxprompt below.

Subraces - Dwarf


Arctic Dwarf

Syntax: Dwarf-arctic
Stats: 
+4 Constitution

Feats: 
Epic Energy Resistance Cold I

Special ability: 
Cold Shield (Elemental Shield): Once per day for 1 round per character level: 10% vulnerable to fire, 10% immunity to cold. Damage Shield Level 1: 2d4, Level 18: 2d6, Level 28: 2d8 and at Level 38: 2d10 + 1 per 2 character levels of cold damage. This does not stack with any other damage shield!



Duergar Dwarf

Syntax: Dwarf-duergar

Stats: 
+2 Dexterity, +4 Wisdom, -2 Charisma

Immunities: 
10% Magical

Vulnerabilities: 
5% Positive

Feats: 
Weapon Focus: Sickle, Improved Critical: Sickle

Light Sensitive: 
-2 ab/-4 ac in outdoor areas during daylight hours.

Special Ability: 
Stone Hold (chaos shield type effect): ability to call upon the aid of the stones to hold their opponents in place - once a day/5 min duration, 2% chance on hit, hold lasts for 1d3 rounds and can stack. Penalty: while using stone hold, duergar loses his dexterity bonus (-2 dex).

Note: 
Remember Sickle feats are usable for Sickles, Heavy Picks, and Light Picks.



Mountain Dwarf

Syntax: Dwarf-mountain

Stats: 
+2 Strength, +4 Constitution, -2 Charisma

Feats: 
Exotic Weapon Proficiency, Weapon Specialization: Dwarven Waraxe

Special Ability: 
Avalanche (Earthquake): 3 times a day the mountain dwarf can cast a special Earthquake at their character level. I.e. a 60th level Mountain Dwarf will cast a 60th level Earthquake.
